suggestions.title: College Student
suggestions.description: Smart planning for your education expenses

recommendations.title: Semester Fee Planning
recommendations.description: Put 2nd to 5th semester fees in Fixed Deposits (safer returns), and 6th to 8th semester fees in Mutual Funds (potential for higher returns)
recommendations.rationale: Early semester fees need more security, while later ones have time to grow

recommendations.title: Emergency Fund
recommendations.description: Keep 3 months of expenses in a high-yield savings account
recommendations.rationale: Quick access to funds for unexpected needs

recommendations.title: Skill Development
recommendations.description: Invest 10% of savings in online courses and certifications

recommendations.title: Tax Saving Strategy
recommendations.description: Maximize 80C through ELSS funds (₹1.5L) and NPS (additional ₹50k)
recommendations.rationale: Tax benefits with potential for high returns

recommendations.title: Home Down Payment
recommendations.description: 50% in debt funds, 30% in high-yield FDs, 20% in liquid funds
recommendations.rationale: Balanced approach for 3-5 year home buying goal

recommendations.title: Career Growth
recommendations.description: Invest in advanced certifications through RD savings

recommendations.title: Children's Education
recommendations.description: Start SIP in aggressive hybrid funds 15 years before college
recommendations.rationale: Long-term growth with reducing risk as goal approaches

recommendations.title: Health Security
recommendations.description: Family floater health insurance + top-up plan + emergency corpus in FDs

recommendations.title: Retirement Planning
recommendations.rationale: Balanced portfolio for long-term wealth creation

recommendations.title: Regular Income
recommendations.description: SCSS (60%), Monthly Income Plans (20%), Liquid Funds (20%)
recommendations.rationale: Focus on regular income with capital preservation

recommendations.title: Healthcare Fund
recommendations.description: Super Top-up Health Insurance + FD ladder for medical expenses

recommendations.title: Legacy Planning
recommendations.description: Balance between PMVVY, tax-free bonds, and short-term debt funds
recommendations.rationale: Efficient wealth transfer while maintaining liquidity
